category-def.name: org.xkonnex.repo
category-def.label: XKonneX Repository
category-def.description: XKonneX Repository is an OpenSource service repository that is based on Xtext for service modelling. It does more than just storing and managing contracts of services in a SOA environment: Based on contracts defined with DSLs as well as applying model validators and code generation, it speeds up the service development and SOA governance approval processes with automated compliance checks.
